channel.title: GitHub AngelScript Weekly Trending
channel.description: Weekly Trending of AngelScript in GitHub

item.title: Felix3322/PotPlayer_Chatgpt_Translate
item.description: 这个实时字幕翻译插件将OpenAI的ChatGPT API（或任何具有相同API调用方法的模型）集成到PotPlayer中。它使你在观看视频时能够实时翻译字幕，从而打破语言障碍，提升你的观看体验。 This real-time subtitle translation plugin integrates OpenAI's ChatGPT API (or any model with the same API calling method) into PotPlayer. It enables you to translate subtitles on-the-fly while watching videos.

item.title: chen310/BilibiliPotPlayer
item.description: PotPlayer 哔哩哔哩插件：可以直接在 PotPlayer 中播放哔哩哔哩中的视频、直播和音乐
